articles.title: Scientists identify coronavirus COVID-19 virus `hidden` new gene - Zee News
articles.description: Researchers have identified a new  hidden  gene in SARS-CoV-2, the virus responsible for Covid-19, that may have contributed to its unique biology and pandemic potential.
articles.content:
